from bokeh.io import curdoc
from bokeh.layouts import row, column
from bokeh.models import ColumnDataSource, GMapOptions

from bokeh.models.widgets import Slider, TextInput
import random

zoom_slider = Slider(title='Zoom Level', value=11, start=0, end=20, step=1)
lat_textbox = TextInput(title='Latitude', value='49.285006')
lon_textbox = TextInput(title='Longitude', value='-123.118050')

source_gps = ColumnDataSource(data=dict(lat=df1['latitude'], lon=df1['latitude']))
initial_map_options = GMapOptions(lat=49.285006, lng=-123.118050, map_type="roadmap", zoom=11)

p = gmap("AIzaSyCPK5YIx7ZzUjfChnH8R7eAd2mnL27pPaI", 
map_options=initial_map_options, title="BC",plot_width=800, plot_height=00)
p.circle(x="lon", y="lat", size=15, fill_color="blue", fill_alpha=0.8, source=source_gps)


def update_data(attrname, old, new):
    zoom = zoom_slider.value
    lat = float(lat_textbox.value)
    lon = float(lon_textbox.value)
    source_gps.data = dict(lat=df1['latitude'],
                       lon=df1['latitude'])
    p.map_options = GMapOptions(lat=lat, lng=lon, map_type="roadmap", zoom=zoom)


for w in [zoom_slider, lat_textbox, lon_textbox]:
    w.on_change('value', update_data)

# Set up layouts and add to document
inputs = column(zoom_slider, lat_textbox, lon_textbox)

curdoc().add_root(row(inputs, p, width=800))
curdoc().title = "Google Map"
